A great crew deserves great support - that's the guiding principle that drives Kelly's work as an Inflight supervisor every day. He's the first to admit the job's far from routine, but Kelly says that's part of the fun! 

Interested in joining our team? https://t.co/T9yDw6B0Zl https://t.co/VELf1vIS4K

Who's ready for new nonstop routes? 🙋🙋‍♂️

Allegiant's nonstop network is growing with NINE new routes! The new routes will take flight in early 2022, so check them out and start planning your next trip at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu. https://t.co/1jSVZFHjYB

Destination: Game Time 🏈

Today we took a major step toward expanding our service to Mexico. Together with @VivaAerobus, we submitted a DOT application for a unique business alliance that will expand our low-cost, nonstop service to Cancun, Los Cabos and Puerto Vallarta.

Details: https://t.co/rIIgtljNtG https://t.co/Zy3HealLP9

data.text: Sunshine state of mind. ☀️ https://t.co/lYcQ8XM3jR

Yesterday, we celebrated the opening of our new base at @AUStinAirport by kicking off nonstop service to NINE new cities! This $75 million base is now home to three A320s and our first Austin-based team of pilots, flight attendants, maintenance techs and ground support staff. https://t.co/SYM0jDzU7I

Just a little bit of orange ties the whole look together, don't you think? 🍁

📸: flypsm https://t.co/HnBfQ7nhn7

Let us tell you about an adorable little traveler named Benny who spent his time at the airport making us one outrageously cool paper plane that he hand-delivered to our pilots. Get ready, Benny, because we made a few paper planes of our own to say thank you! https://t.co/95jgEvqNtw

data.text:

data.text: Today, we proudly introduce Allways Rewards, the very first airline loyalty program designed specifically for leisure travelers! https://t.co/PDadN2OeHm

Our all-nonstop network just keeps on growing! Today, we are introducing 2️⃣2️⃣ brand new routes!

Get ready. Get set. GO NONSTOP at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu. https://t.co/bXYtc89ot4
Three cheers for the weekend! 🎉🎉🎉 https://t.co/z7zW7knAvD

It's official! Construction will resume on our destination resort, Sunseeker Resort Charlotte Harbor, this month!

In addition to bringing 800 construction jobs to the area, Sunseeker will ultimately employ 1,150 people, making it the third largest employer in Southwest Florida. https://t.co/Lb772hLYvc
💙🧡💛 https://t.co/66zwdXX7UZ
✅ Now the real question - which music venue is at the top of your concert bucket list?

LOVE LIVE MUSIC? We're partnering with Live Nation venues, Ticketmaster and the biggest music festivals to bring together the best of travel and live entertainment. Get unprecedented access and enjoy once-in-a-lifetime live music experiences! 

Learn more: https://t.co/RNe0bJrAPj https://t.co/zC0kXz5bqD

What better way to celebrate the opening of our newest base in Des Moines than by launching three new routes?

This was our first base opening in nearly a year and a half. And now that the base is officially open, we can continue expanding service and bring new jobs to the area. https://t.co/ltp6JdqceD
